description: Band Interleaved by Pixel image encoding.  BIP stores values for all spectral bands for the first pixel, followed by all spectral band values for the second pixel, etc.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension"></field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: Band Interleaved by Pixel (BIP) Image Encoding
